price: Silaa yeroo san dhugumatti nu biraa mindaa guddaa isaaniif kennina turre.
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
